items.title: TUI: Consolidate Clocks & Header Cleanup
items.description: Currently, there are two clocks visible in the TUI: one in the top header (with 'AgentRecallTextualApp') and one in the dashboard (with 'Updated timestamp'). We need to simplify this to a single, clean clock display.
requirements: Remove the 'AgentRecallTextualApp' header branding and its associated clock.
Update the dashboard clock to remove the 'Updated' prefix, showing only the current time.
Ensure the remaining clock is clearly visible and updates correctly.
acceptance_criteria: The top header bar matches the new minimal design (no default Textual header).
The dashboard header shows only the time (e.g., '14:30:00' instead of 'Updated 2024-05-20 14:30:00').
Only one clock is running in the TUI viewport.

items.title: TUI: Global Padding Reduction
items.description: The current TUI layout uses excessive padding, making the interface feel sparse and wasting screen real estate. We need to tighten the layout globally.
requirements: Review and reduce padding/margins in global CSS (`APP_CSS`).
Ensure content remains readable but denser.
acceptance_criteria: Information density is improved without breaking visual hierarchy.

items.title: TUI: Enhanced Diff Viewer
items.description: The current diff summary is insufficient for reviewing changes. We need a robust diff viewer that allows traversing the diff tree and viewing detailed changes per file.
requirements: [DONE] Implement a file tree view for changed files in the diff.
[DONE] Create a detail view to show the actual diff content for the selected file.
[DONE] Support syntax highlighting for diffs (e.g., using `rich.syntax.Syntax`).

[DONE] Evaluate external Python packages for TUI diffs if they offer better functionality than building from scratch (e.g., `textual-diff` or similar if available, otherwise custom builds with `difflib`).
acceptance_criteria: [DONE] User can see a list of changed files.
[DONE] User can select a file to view its specific diff.
[DONE] Diff view handles scrolling for large files/diffs.
[DONE] Syntax highlighting is applied to the diff output.
